title:
m4zlum:

Attacks on HDP offices. Demirtas: Don’t think these...
content:
m4zlum:


Attacks on HDP offices. Demirtas: Don’t think these “lynch” mobs came onto streets on own initiative. They are backed by the state and government. Our supporters were killed, and our offices attacked even before June 7 vote when soldiers weren’t dying. These attacks are not about “terror”. 

Turkish media excuses the fascist violence against Kurds in the last two days as “anti-terror protests”
